## Page 2

phenbiox
Recommendations /Raccomandazioni
During formulation consider that the product has an acidic pH/Tenere presente in fase formulativa che il
prodotto ha un pH acido.
Store in a cool dry place, avoid prolonged exposure to light and heat/Conservare in luogo fresco e asciutto
al riparo da fonti di calore e di luce.
Due to the nature of the product a light precipitation might occur/Vista la naturalità del prodotto è possibile
la formazione di una leggera posa.
Statements/Dichiarazioni
ORIGIN/ORIGINE: Plant derived product/Prodotto di origine vegetale.
PREFERENTIAL ORIGIN/ORIGINE PREFERENZIALE: The product is of EU (Italian) preferential origin
/ Il prodotto originario della COMUNITÀ EUROPEA (ITALIA)
SOLVENT IMPURITY/SOLVENTI RESIDUI: No solvent has been used in the production of the product
except water and/or glycerine/Non si utilizzano solventi, tranne acqua e/o glicerina vegetale.
GMO/OGM: The product does not contain nor does not come from genetically modified plant
materials/ingredients therefore is considered a GMO free product/Il prodotto non contiene e non proviene
da Organismi Geneticamente Modificati pertanto può essere considerate un prodotto OGM free.
ANIMAL TESTING/TEST SU ANIMALI: The product has not been tested on animals/Il prodotto non è mai
stato testato su animali.
SHELF-LIFE/DURATA DI CONSERVAZIONE: 12 months/12 mesi
Last update/Ultimo aggiornamento: 25/10/2017
Phenbiox s.r.l.
PHENBIOX srl via Ungheri 7/H 40012 Calderara di Reno (BO), Italy -C.F. / P.IVA / VAT nº 02696621206
Tel/Phone: +39 051 726640 - e-mail: info@phenbiox.it
gpt_manufacturer_or_supplier_reason: The technical data sheet for ACTIVE JUICE CAVOLO NERO (KALE) clearly lists PHENBIOX srl as the manufacturer or supplier, including their address, contact information, and VAT number on both pages.
gpt_select_industry_cluster_reason: Selected Personal Care because the document explicitly states the product is an ingredient for cosmetic products, indicating its use in the personal care industry. There is no mention or indication of use in homecare or institutional cleaning.
gpt_select_compositions_reason: Selected Derived Natural because the product is described as a plant derived product and contains natural ingredients like citric acid, sodium benzoate, and potassium sorbate. Selected Vegetal because the main ingredient is Brassica oleracea acephala juice (kale leaf juice), and the product is explicitly stated as a fresh vegetal juice and plant derived product. Biomolecule/Micro-organisms is not selected as there is no mention of microorganisms or biomolecules. Mineral is not selected as no mineral ingredients are listed. Synthetic is not selected because the preservatives used (sodium benzoate, potassium sorbate) are naturally derived and no synthetic chemicals are mentioned.
gpt_select_functions_reason: No specific functional claims or uses related to the listed functions are mentioned in the document. The product is described as a fresh vegetal juice ingredient for cosmetic products with no explicit functional properties such as antioxidant, preservative, emulsifier, or others stated.
gpt_select_applications_reason: Selected Skin Care because the product is described as an ingredient for cosmetic products, specifically a fresh vegetal juice from kale leaves, which is commonly used in skin care formulations.
gpt_cas_from_doc_reason: The document lists CAS numbers only for the ingredients (AQUA, CITRIC ACID, SODIUM BENZOATE, POTASSIUM SORBATE) but does not provide a CAS number for the product ACTIVE JUICE CAVOLO NERO (KALE) itself.
gpt_physical_form_reason: Selected Liquid because the product is described as a 'Fresh vegetal juice' and its aspect is specified as 'Water solution' in the document.
gpt_gen_product_description: ACTIVE JUICE CAVOLO NERO (KALE) is a fresh vegetal juice derived from kale leaves, presented as a water-based solution with a characteristic color and odor. It contains 20% kale juice along with citric acid and preservatives, offering an acidic pH between 2.6 and 3.5. This natural, GMO-free ingredient is ideal for cosmetic formulations, providing plant-derived benefits while ensuring safety with low microbial content and no animal testing. It should be stored in a cool, dry place away from light and heat to maintain quality over its 12-month shelf life.
gpt_recommended_dosage_reason: No recommended dosage instructions are mentioned in the document for ACTIVE JUICE CAVOLO NERO (KALE) from PHENBIOX srl.
gpt_certifications_reason: No certifications related to the product ACTIVE JUICE CAVOLO NERO (KALE) from PHENBIOX srl are mentioned in the provided document.
gpt_claims_reason: No specific claims related to any of the listed properties are mentioned in the document. The technical data sheet only provides composition, physical-chemical properties, origin, and storage recommendations without any functional or cosmetic claims.
gpt_health_benefits_reason: Only applicable for FBI business line
